title: Sportscast - October 4, 2015
text:
Sports » Sports Featured » Sportscast - October 4, 2015 Sports Featured 
Updated: Sun, Oct 04 2015, 11:33 PM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 Newscast from October 4, 2015. Related Stories   Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires Entertainment News 
BILL COSBY - NEW INVESTIGATION 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- So far, Bill Cosby has never been charged with a crime -- despite dozens of women coming forward to claim he sexually assaulted them, in some cases after drugging them. 
THAT'S "ONE WAY" TO ADOPT A PUPPY 
PORTLAND, Maine (AP) -- And they called it puppy love -- and with good reason, too. Business News 
US hiring slows in September amid slower global growth 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- U.S. hiring slowed sharply last month and previous job gains were revised lower amid a broad slowdown in the global economy. 
IN THE NEWS: T-MOBILE DATA HACK 
NEW YORK (AP) -- It's nervous time for subscribers of T-Mobile.
